sourcesContent:
// src/components/About.js
import { Box, Flex, Heading, Text, Image, VStack, HStack, Icon, Link } from '@chakra-ui/react';
import { FaLinkedin, FaGithub, FaTwitter } from 'react-icons/fa';

const About = () => (
  <Box id="about" py="10" px="5" bg="white" borderTop="2px solid" borderColor="gray.200">
    <Flex
      direction={{ base: 'column', md: 'row' }}
      align="center"
      justify="space-between"
      maxW="1200px"
      mx="auto"
      gap="8"
    >
      {/* About Text Section */}
      <VStack align={{ base: 'center', md: 'start' }} textAlign={{ base: 'center', md: 'left' }} spacing="5">
        <Heading size="xl" color="orange.500">About Me</Heading>
        <Text fontSize="lg" color="gray.600" maxW="600px">
          I'm Kenneth, a passionate web developer focused on building responsive, user-friendly websites and applications. I specialize in front-end technologies such as React.js, JavaScript, and UI/UX design principles. My goal is to create intuitive and engaging digital experiences that solve real-world problems.
        </Text>
        <Text fontSize="lg" color="gray.600" maxW="600px">
          I am constantly learning and evolving in the field of web development, keeping up with the latest technologies and trends. Let's collaborate and create something amazing!
        </Text>

        {/* Social Media Icons */}
        <HStack spacing="6">
          <Link href="https://linkedin.com/in/your-linkedin" isExternal _hover={{ color: 'orange.400' }}>
            <Icon as={FaLinkedin} w={6} h={6} />
          </Link>
          <Link href="https://github.com/your-github" isExternal _hover={{ color: 'orange.400' }}>
            <Icon as={FaGithub} w={6} h={6} />
          </Link>
          <Link href="https://twitter.com/your-twitter" isExternal _hover={{ color: 'orange.400' }}>
            <Icon as={FaTwitter} w={6} h={6} />
          </Link>
        </HStack>
      </VStack>

      {/* About Image Section */}
      <Box
        borderRadius="lg"
        overflow="hidden"
        boxShadow="lg"
        _hover={{ boxShadow: '2xl', transform: 'scale(1.02)', transition: 'all 0.3s ease' }}
      >
        <Image
          src="src\Images\IMG_20240830_170402_495.jpg" 
          alt="Kenneth's profile"
          objectFit="cover"
          boxSize={{ base: '300px', md: '400px' }}
        />
      </Box>
    </Flex>
  </Box>
);

export default About;
